resources.string: More events are coming soon! "\n" Stay tuned

The application has been designed by student Kyriaki Paniskaki for her thesis, under the supervision of professor Athina Vakali. "

Register in order to receive messages and to be able to update the database. Also, you will be able to enshrine participation for a walk. Requires internet connection.
Welcome in Thessaloniki Walking Tours App. Now you will receive messages from server, you will be able to refresh the content of walks and also to enshrine participation for a walk.

Journalist and team manager. She organizes walking tours and she is responsible for the company’s communication and public relations. She never misses the opportunity to take photographic snapshots during the walking tours.
Journalist, radio and television producer with vast experience in the TV reportage and a real taste aficionado, he keeps wandering in the markets offering an unforgettable gastronomic experience.

Archaeologist, art historian, a PhD student and a licensed tour guide, with a subversive attitude and an endless humour. He is a real storyteller and he has a deep knowledge of the city’s history, a history that will lead you to the most unexpected places.

Archaeologist, a PhD student of Byzantine archaeology and a licensed tour guide. He is both a magnificent narrator and an inquiring mind and he has a really unique way of approaching not only city’s history but also city’s stories and urban legends.

Archaeologist and a theatre aficionado, she designed a very agreeable evening walking tour full of theatre stories, secret love stories and urban legends that come right from the Belle Epoque era in Thessaloniki.

Journalist and professor, in charge of promotion issues. Being also fully capable to understand the students’ needs and combine the informal learning with fun, she is a valuable advisor to the educational program of the company.
The team of Thessaloniki Walking Tour consist of
You should register first. Go to register screen in order to register.
Pressing the refresh button at the top right, you can refresh the content if there are new entries. Requires internet connection.
You haven\'t participate in anyone walk.
Here are appeared the walks in which you have participated.
You can register in walk by pressing the button that you will find at the end of screen. Requires internet connection.
There isn\'t internet access. Enable the internet connection in order to load the map.
There isn\'t internet access. Enable the internet connection in order to enshrine the participation.
Please enter valid email and check again the password.
An email has sent to the e-mail address. Please confirm the e-mail address in order to proceed with the registration. When you confirm the e-mail address click the button below in order to continue.
You haven\'t validate the e-mail address. Please check you mailbox.
Login failed because your username or password was entered incorrectly. Try again

Get an account in order to receive messages from server, to refresh the content of walks and also you will be able to enshrine participation for a walk. You can create a new account by pressing the register button or you can log in if you already have an account, by pressing the log in button. Requires internet connection.
